disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Damnation.

blurb.value: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

description.value: Innate: Enemy champions, large minions and large monsters that die near Thresh drop a Soul for 8 seconds. Epic monsters drop 2 Souls instead. Small minions and lesser monsters have a 33.33% chance to drop a Soul.

description2.value: Thresh autonomously collects Souls near him or a placed Dark Passage.

description3.value: Each collected Soul grants Thresh  0.75 ability power and  0.75 bonus armor.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Souls grant a small area of sight. Souls are visible to allies and only become visible to enemies if their team has sight of Thresh. The probability for souls dropping from small minions and monster on Summoner's Rift starts at 33% but adjusts dynamically to match the expected quota of souls dropped (lowers if above, rises if below, remains if even). Souls collected are not considered when adjusting the probability. The maximum amount of souls Thresh can collect is 999,999, granting him 749,999 bonus ability power and 749,999 bonus armor (99.99% damage reduction, reduced to 99.98% when hit by Last Whisper). Nunu & Willump drop a soul each (sometimes the icy ghosts from Twin Shadows' active will drop one each after reaching their targets).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Death Sentence.

blurb.value: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.

description.value: Active: Thresh throws out his scythe in the target direction, becoming unable to move or attack while it is in flight.

description2.value: The scythe stops with the first enemy it hits, dealing magic damage, revealing them, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds while also forming a tether between Thresh and them for the duration. Hitting an enemy reduces Death Sentence's  cooldown by 3 seconds and slows Thresh by 20% for 1 second.

description3.value: While the tether persists, Thresh is unable to declare basic attacks and periodically tugs at his scythe's chain, pulling the target a short distance towards himself. After 0.5 seconds of hitting an enemy or instantly after hitting a minion or monster, Thresh can recast the ability to cast Deathly Leap, doing so will cause him to stop tugging.

description4.value: Recast: Thresh dashes to the tethered enemy, becoming able to attack again upon arrival. Thresh can cast any of his abilities while in flight with the exception of The Box.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Death Sentence is a two part ability. The first when Thresh casts the spell, the second when he releases the hook. Deathly Leap can be reactivated for a potential third application. Each count as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Thresh will not face in the target direction during Death Sentence's cast animation (only after the projectile starts traveling). The dash has a maximum following range. While grounded or rooted Death Sentence cannot be recast. Death Sentence will not stun enemies that are displacement immune or cc-immune but the link will still be created and Thresh is still granted the ability to recast for his dash. If the missile is blocked by spell shield, Thresh will also not create the link. Death Sentence's stun duration is reduced by tenacity but the tether will always persist for the full duration, unless the target uses a cleansing effect. Death Sentence's stun will persist even if Thresh dies before the duration ends, but the target will no longer be pulled. If the target is crowd control immune or displacement immune, Thresh will not tug at his chain even if the immunity wears off before Death Sentence ends.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Dark Passage.

blurb.value: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.

description.value: Active: Thresh throws his lantern to the target location which lands after 0.5 seconds, lasting for 6 seconds or until he moves too far away from it, revealing its surroundings.

description2.value: Thresh and the first allied champion to come near the lantern are granted a shield for 4 seconds. An ally can select the lantern while in proximity of it, dashing to Thresh's current location and gaining the shield.

leveling2.value: Shield Strength:60 / 100 / 140 / 180 / 220 (+ 1 per Soul collected)

description3.value: An ally cannot select the lantern while silenced, grounded or immobilized.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Allies can pick up the lantern through thin walls if its grab radius allows it. Thresh cannot grab the lantern but can shield himself if he is near it. The lantern is considered a unit and can be targeted by an allied Teleport, Leap Strike, Shunpo, and Safeguard. It is untargetable to enemies. The lantern's duration and maximum leash range are each displayed as a circle on the ground. Dark Passage is special cased to trigger Guardian.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Flay.

blurb.value: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.

description.value: Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, with the  AD ratio increasing based on the time spent not basic attacking enemies, up to 10 seconds.

leveling.value: Minimum Bonus Magic Damage:»1 per Soul collected (+ 0% AD)«Maximum Bonus Magic Damage:1 per Soul collected (+ 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200% AD)

description2.value: Active: Thresh sweeps his chain around him and in a broad line towards the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit, knocking them in the chain's direction, and afterwards slowing them for 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Applies area damage on the ability and deals proc damage on the enhanced basic attack. Flay's passive's buff icon changes colors depending on charge level: 0 - 50% 50 - 75% 75% - 100% 100% At 100%, Thresh's scythe will glow green and a sound effect will play. Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury will apply Flay's passive to each enemy hit, with the secondary targets taking minimum damage (charge resets upon hitting the primary target). The enhanced attack applies other on-hit effects and can critically strike as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect structures or wards (hitting them does not consume the bonus damage or reset the charge). Flay's passive can be dodged (the enhanced attack is not consumed and the charge is not reset). PENDING FOR TEST: Enhanced attack's interactions with blocking and blinding effects (regarding both bonus damage and charge reset).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from The Box.

blurb.value: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.

description.value: Active: Thresh surrounds himself with a pentagon of spectral walls, each one lasting for up to 5 seconds. Walls break upon contact with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to the target and slowing them by 99% for 2 seconds.

description2.value: Enemy champions hitting any wall beyond the first take no damage and are slowed for only 1 second.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The Box is always cast from the original casting position.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
